column5: http://www.travelzoo.com/ca/local-deals/Toronto/Other/30761?utm_source=localdeal_ca&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=1372259_html_toronto  Just thought some might want to take advantage of this deal...  Make sure you read the fine print.
I especially like the hightlight of being able to bring home a speckled trout!!!!
LOL, that's a rainbow! Thanks for posting fisher!
If caught out of a private pond -lake  you would be able to take it home (speckle trout).
I've never seen or heard of speckled trout in Simcoe.  Must be another Lake Simcoe??
If theres specks in any creek leading into simcoe .. then they came from the lake..
lots of specks stay in creeks all winter. I know many speck creeks that are nowhere near a lake.
The notty would be one example...
Pretty cheesy, ya have to bring your own firewood for the stove, maybe just take out a couple of the inside 2 x 4's...
